name: Linefill
description: Linefill is a game where you control a line. Use Arrow Keys (WASD not supported) to extend the line in that direction. In order to win, you have to cover all tiles in the level. There are also 3 mechanics, but I won't tell you because I want you to see it for yourself. This is now the second game I've posted on the internet. There's a windows and mac version.
